text: Per Olof Andreas Norlén (; born 6 May 1973) is a Swedish politician. He is a member of the Moderate Party. He has been the Speaker of the Riksdag since September 2018. He has been a member of parliament (MP) for Östergötland County since October 2006. ==References== Category:Speakers of the Riksdag Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Politicians from Stockholm
title: Andreas Norlén
